chapters.title: Chapter 44: HuntedChapter 45: Caemlyn
chapters.info: Jain Farstrider, p. 527 (423)—Hero of legend from Malkier who had many adventures. There is a book about him, The Travels of Jain Farstrider, that Mat intends to read but never has. The book is quite popular with his friends. His real last name is Charin.
